author: Andy Hong
comment: [Update: Abandonware. Replaced by "Magic Watch Face."] I love the design aesthetics of this watchface. And it has just enough customizations to make it feel personalized. Importantly, on my Gear Live, battery life is exemplary with this watchface. Unfortunately, the transition animation between active and ambient screens doesn't always finish, so about 20% of the time, the ambient screen displays the wrong time. So as a watch, this watchface fails.

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Dear Andy, Really sorry about this kind of inconvenience. We are gonna try our best to fix it ! A update is on the way now . Really appreciate it !

title: [No longer updated.] Well-designed customizations and battery-efficient. Wrong time.

author: Tony Alexander
comment: I think the DEV team hit a home run with the base app. My guess is that more great features and functionality will be introduced on top of the existing base.

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Hi  Айдар ! Thank you for rating us ! what a awesome 4 stars you gave us ! Besides. Do you wanna get all magic faces for free ? Feel free to check below link and join our community . Magic first internal testing is here,and you are invited ! https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896

title: Great Foundation With Potential

author: Gerrit Van Wyngaard
comment: Awesome watchfaces. Clean and neat. Pity there is no month function dial. Also would be great to allow the function dials to be made resizable. Also drop the full stop in the day of week function. Then it will be great.

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content:
Dear Gearrit.
You are the first user who left such a awesome comment to us,and really appreciate it ! We will try our best to add the month function into next version. Follow us on twitter,
https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface 
Wanna be an internal tester before public?
 https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896.
Thanks !

title: Well done

author: Kevin Warner
comment: I got to be honest I thought that the faces on the front advert come with the price. They do not and I was gutted.

reply.author: magic watchface
reply.content: Dear kevin, Really sorry about this.........

title: Misleading

author: Dave Levin
comment: All watch faces should work like this. Love the ability to switch it up. Would love to be able to change the size of the features, they're a butt small
title: Best face I've found so far

author: Ritik Dhiranan
comment: No Option to change temperature from Fahrenheit to Celsius.
title: Difficulty

author: Konstantin Benenson
comment: Guys, any way to switch to Celsius for temperature?
title: Celsius?

author: Austin Szilagyi
comment: Love the aesthetics, but why does the time start at noon every time I unlock the watch but then spins to the correct time? Not a fan of that and if you can fix it, I will gladly redownload it.
